text:
This repo has the code that I used to create a neural network framework in Java. This project was part of my experience in understanding the inner workings of neural networks. As an initial test of the model, I implemented written digit classification using the MNIST database. As a more ambitious test, I attempted to use this framework to generate music. While the results of both of these tests were mixed, I did find that the models were able to reduce loss to a certain extent.

Project on Github
AI Music Output on Youtube
